mapper.update:
update sys_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pic_id = #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
media_type = #{mediaType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sys_code = #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
app_key = #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
att3 = #{att3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
att4 = #{att4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
att5 = #{att5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
att6 = #{att6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_att1 = #{dateAtt1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
date_att2 = #{dateAtt2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_att2 = #{numAtt2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_att3 = #{numAtt3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
num_att4 = #{numAtt4,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_tel = #{companyTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_address = #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
speciality_value = #{specialityValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email_verify_state = #{emailVerifyState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mobile_verify_state = #{mobileVerifyState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
idcard_verify_state = #{idcardVerifyState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
application_date = #{applicationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
verify_user = #{verifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
verify_date = #{verifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
area_long_code = #{areaLongCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reason_rejected = #{reasonRejected,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_ids = #{brandIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_imei = #{userImei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consum_amount = #{consumAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
balance_amount = #{balanceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consum_integral = #{consumIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
balance_integral = #{balanceIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usable_house_number = #{usableHouseNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
network_card_restrict = #{networkCardRestrict,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exists_mobile = #{existsMobile,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mobile_opened_date = #{mobileOpenedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
mobile_closed_date = #{mobileClosedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
visitors_render_times = #{visitorsRenderTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
business_administration_id = #{businessAdministrationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
franchiser_account_type = #{franchiserAccountType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
franchiser_group_id = #{franchiserGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: id, user_name, nick_name, mobile, password, email, user_type, sex, job, area_id, pic_id, media_type, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, app_key, token, att3, att4, att5, att6, date_att1, date_att2, group_id, num_att2, num_att3, num_att4, remark, real_name, qq, company_tel, company_address, speciality_value, intro, email_verify_state, mobile_verify_state, idcard_verify_state, LEVEL, application_date, verify_user, verify_date, area_long_code, reason_rejected, brand_ids, user_imei, consum_amount, balance_amount, address, consum_integral, balance_integral, usable_house_number, network_card_restrict, exists_mobile, mobile_opened_date, mobile_closed_date, visitors_render_times, business_administration_id, franchiser_account_type, franchiser_group_id, open_id, mini_program_company_id
mapper.select: SELECT C.id as id, P.price as price, P.user_pay_type as userPayType FROM sys_user_level_config C INNER JOIN sys_user_level_price P ON C.business_id = P.id WHERE C.business_type_id = #{businessTypeId} AND C.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT P.id AS id, P.end_user_group_name AS endUserGroupName, P.user_pay_type AS userPayType, P.price AS price FROM sys_user U INNER JOIN sys_user_register_info R ON U.id = R.user_id INNER JOIN sys_user_level_price P ON P.end_user_group_name = R.user_type WHERE U.id = #{userId} and U.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY P.user_pay_type desc;
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user_level_config SET business_id = #{levelId} WHERE id=#{id}
